title: How to Make Spice Salt

steps.headline: Mix all of the ingredients together.
steps.description: You can either choose from the ingredients for the basic salt mix, or for the Indian spicy salt mix.

steps.headline: Keep covered in an airtight container or jar for storage.
steps.description: Avoid getting steam in the container when cooking.

text: Mix all of the ingredients together. You can either choose from the ingredients for the basic salt mix, or for the Indian spicy salt mix. Sift three times.  Keep covered in an airtight container or jar for storage. Avoid getting steam in the container when cooking.
